description:
This software does what it's designed to do well. I saw a few reviews that said it needed improvement, but how
many accountabilty apps do you see that even FEATURE a linux client - this is the only one I know of! Well done
guys!

This is the best accountability software that I have used. It is way better than Covenant Eyes as it is able to record more and it supports far more operating systems. I just wish that the open source accountability software were still maintained.
Honestly, this software is great, but it doesn't see the GnomeWeb traffic. If it could see that, then it would be 5 stars.

This is nothing more than a conservative, religious brainwash programme that collects tax free money in return for the belief and reverence for mythical creatures. I am, I have to say pretty shocked that this sort of spy ware is allowed in to the Repo'.
I am assuming that nobody actually checked this before it was released to the wild. 
Avoid.
summary: Before you in stall, look at their web site....

description: This is the only company that has bothered to provide an accountability solution for Linux. All of the other players, even though there's a demand for it, just flat out don't care and don't want to bother. Thank you accountable2you for your work on this! The new snap is working great.
summary: The only accountability solution for Linux!

description: The app does exactly what it says and does it well.

This is the only accountability software on Linux and it's great. Amazing also that the snap is their default install method! You just install it, and it just works. Great stuff.

In response to Mark's review (03/05/2020 - one star), I think even if you don't believe in a god one can still see that pornography may be a thing which would be desirable to avoid and this app helps with that Why should religion-related apps be removed from the software store in any case? Is it right for the store to be outright atheistic rather than merely secular?
summary: The only accountability software on Linux

description: Best accountablity platform I've seen on any platform. Super exceted that they have a linux client. Works great.

Nothing but good things to say over here! The app does what it's supposed to do, stays out of my way, and offers amazing accountability in the process. Thanks for bringing accountability to Linux, A2U!
summary: The ONLY accountability option for Linux works GREAT!

description: Paul Tucker is the Director of Customer Care of Accountable2You according to his LinkedIn account.
I like this so far - beats the competitors prices and it does what it promises for me so far.
This should absolutely have no place on linux or anywhere else.
I've been using this app for several years and it consistently and reliably tracks my activity without getting in the way of my normal computer use. It just works, and works well.

I'm amazed how much this app has reduced my online temptation. It's really incredible to find something like this that works so well on Arch Linux! I've also got it installed on all my other Operating Systems -- Android, Mac, and other Linux distros. It's a massive blessing for me.
I would be in such a mess without this software. It's awesome.
